page.title: 15ABBERTON
page.content: {ABBERTON MANOR NURSING HOME _}the house was built in the reign of Queen Anne. The grounds cover 14 acres with superb views over the Roman River Valley. The Manor has been carefully restored and retains many original features such as the main staircase and marble fireplaces. The Manor nowadays provides private 24 hour nursing care. {BLIND KNIGHTS _}is now a private house The present owner,Mrs Martin,has deeds going back to the 16th century. It is said that the house was used as a hospital for knights who were blinded or lost limbs fighting in the Crusades. Much of the land surrounding the house was lost when Abberton Reservoir was built.
